name: GreenRubino
tagline: Insight, Connectivity & Creativity Go Hand in Hand
description: GreenRubino is a truly integrated marketing agency. "Truly"​ being the key differentiator. We've built each service from the top down. Specialists in advertising, web/interactive, design/branding and PR have each crafted their respective teams. Collectively, they deliver solutions that best meet our clients'​ overall objectives. This truly integrated approach enables us to bring unique, clear and comprehensive perspectives and ideas to each project we create.
